title: Pixel 3 and 3XL double sim double standby support
content:
What a joke it is that Pixel 3 an 3XL doesn't have DSDS ability? I would return the phone if I could for such a deficiency! Basic stuff that cheapo Chinese manufacturers do in every other phone, and my 800 euros device is limp??? 

And now, you give the ability to the cheaper 3a??? Are you going to exchange it for my Pixel 3 and return me the difference??

Joke!
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
